Interface Movable

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface Movable
extends GameObject

countGravity

void countGravity()
This method adjusts speed based on gravity. Implementing classes must override this method.

countMagnetism

void countMagnetism(AbstractMovable obj)
Adjusts speed based on magnetic attraction to given object. Implementing classes must override this method.

Parameters:
obj - the object to calculate attraction towards.

getXSpeed

double getXSpeed()
The accessor for horizontal the speed of the object. Included here for calling purposes. Implementing classes must override this method.

Returns:
the horizontal speed of the object.

setXSpeed

void setXSpeed(double speed)
The mutator for horizontal the speed of the object. Included here for calling purposes. Implementing classes must override this method.

Parameters:
speed - the new horizontal speed.

getYSpeed

The accessor for vertical the speed of the object. Included here for calling purposes. Implementing classes must override this method.

Returns:
the vertical speed of the object.

setYSpeed

void setYSpeed(double speed)
The mutator for vertical the speed of the object. Included here for calling purposes. Implementing classes must override this method.

Parameters:
speed - the new vertical speed.
